display_name: Average hours of sleep per night on weekdays or workdays during the last 4 weeks of pregnancy - Mother
description: Thinking back on the LAST 4 WEEKS of your pregnancy, about how many hours of sleep per night did you usually get on WEEKDAYS or WORKDAYS?
